item.title: Text
item.description: **nigraheṇa hi pāpānāṃ sādhūnāṃ saṃgraheṇa ca |** ** dvijātaya ivejyābhiḥ pūyante satataṃ nṛpāḥ || 8.311 ||** pāpayuktāḥ puruṣāḥ pāpāḥ | teṣāṃ nigrahaḥ pūrvoktaḥ[^1] | yathāśāstravartinaḥ[^2] sādhavaḥ | teṣāṃ saṃgraho ‘nugraho yathāśaktyupakāraḥ | tena pūyante vipāpmāno bhavanti prāyaścittenevety[^3] arthavādaḥ | atha vā pāpānutpattir eva pūtatvam | brāhmaṇā iva[^4] satatam ijyābhiḥ nityair mahāyajñādibhiḥ || 8.311 || **kṣantavyaṃ prabhunā nityaṃ kṣipatāṃ kāryiṇāṃ nṛṇām |** ** bālavṛddhāturāṇāṃ ca kurvatā hitam ātmanaḥ || 8.
